channel.title: frankm tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from frankm.

item.description: Yesterday I had a Raspberry Pi crash after a system update and fail to boot. I figured out what went wrong and learned some things along the way. Breaking this is how one tends to learn. https://t.co/3Ausg2pLzH
item.source:markdown: Yesterday I had a Raspberry Pi crash after a system update and fail to boot. I figured out what went wrong and learned some things along the way. Breaking this is how one tends to learn. https://t.co/3Ausg2pLzH
